question: How can I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by entering your order number on our tracking page or by logging into your account. You'll receive real-time updates on your order status.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item, go to 'My Orders', select the item you want to return, choose a reason, and schedule a pickup. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: Double charges can occur due to payment gateway issues. Please check if one charge is pending - it will be automatically reversed. If both charges are confirmed, contact our billing team for immediate assistance.

question: When will my order arrive?
answer: Delivery times vary by location and product. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days, while express delivery takes 1-2 business days. You can check estimated delivery date in your order details.

question: I forgot my password
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link is valid for 24 hours.

question: The website is not loading
answer: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or try accessing the site from an incognito window. If the issue persists, please try a different browser or contact technical support.

question: Can I modify my food order?
answer: You can modify your order within 2 minutes of placing it, before the restaurant starts preparing it. Go to 'Active Orders' and click 'Modify Order' if available.

question: My food is taking too long
answer: Food delivery times can vary based on restaurant preparation time and delivery distance. If your order is significantly delayed, we'll provide real-time updates and may offer compensation.

question: Payment failed but money was deducted
answer: If payment fails but money is deducted, it's usually a temporary hold that will be released within 3-5 business days. If not released automatically, contact our payment support team.

question: The food quality was poor
answer: We're sorry about the poor food quality. Please report this through the app within 24 hours of delivery. We'll investigate with the restaurant and provide a refund or credit as appropriate.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact us through this chat, email us at support@company.com, or call our helpline. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer support is available 24/7. However, some services like refund processing and technical support may have specific business hours (9 AM - 6 PM, Monday to Friday).

question: How do I apply a coupon code?
answer: Enter your coupon code in the 'Promo Code' field during checkout. Make sure the code is valid and meets the minimum order requirements. The discount will be applied automatically.

question: Why didn't my discount apply?
answer: Discounts may not apply if the coupon has expired, doesn't meet minimum order value, or isn't valid for the selected items. Check the coupon terms and conditions for details.

question: The app keeps crashing
answer: Try updating the app to the latest version, restart your device, or clear the app cache. If the problem continues, uninstall and reinstall the app, or contact technical support.
